mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", t.value AS "evalType.value", t.label AS "evalType.label", a.value AS "value", a.remark AS "remark", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate"
RIGHT JOIN sys_dict t on t.value = a.eval_type
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM oa_customer_eval_setting a
where t.type = 'oa_customer_eval_type' ORDER BY t.value ASC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO oa_customer_eval_setting( id, eval_type, value, remark, del_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{evalType.value}, #{value}, #{remark}, #{delFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate} )
mapper.update: UPDATE oa_customer_eval_setting SET eval_type = #{evalType.value}, value = #{value}, remark = #{remark}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
